heading: Photomontage.
general-note: Here are entered works on combining in a single photographic composition elements from various sources by techniques such as taking a number of exposures on the same negative, or superimposing or juxtaposing negatives to form a composite print, as well as collections of such photographs. Works on collage consisting primarily of photographs or reproductions of photographs from magazines, newspapers, etc., are entered under. Photocollage..
